channel.title: OUT OF MEMORY PLS HELP
channel.description:
Engine error - Out of memory at the end of map surface tension at entrance in lambda core. I read about it, ppl said that at this map a lot of resources.. i think simply lacks my 4gb memory, right? what can i do?
PC: nvidia geforce 9600gt amd athlon 2.9 ghz 4gb ram win7 ultimate x86

hmm thanks for answer
but all my services is off + operating system turned on performance (0 effects)
i’ll try defragmentation
can i change the game(config) file with resources to set lower amount of details or its impossible?

item.title: OUT OF MEMORY PLS HELP
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
I was going to make a comment that 4gb should be plenty but then I looked at the store page and saw this under the recommended specs, Memory: 6 GB RAM

Restart and check your system after it has reached steady state (bootup is finished and everything has loaded, but before Windows/defrag/av scan maintenance tasks start), assuming 5 minutes. Open task manager and see how much memory your using, I would hope it is less than 1.7gb. If not you might need to disable some items that you don’t need starting up or do a clean boot and check to see if Black Mesa continues to have a memory issue. https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/929135

Read full topic
